body:
So, hey guys!

I've been playing on avicus for 2 years. It was good but it would be better if I'd play with good gaming comp. Recently my computer started lagging insanely. So, I decided to buy a new computer. I'm ready to pay for it from 500$ to 5000$. I don't know, I could pay more just give me something that will make me feel like it's computer that I'll buy.

Requirements:

- Windows 7/8 (Doesn't matter, both Windows are good)
- Good graphics card (Your choice, I'll let you choose)
- Water cooling system (If possible)
- It should be able to run like 2 GTAs at the same time
- Good fps in minecraft (no limitations really)
- I should be able to record

Feel free to ask me anything via replies. If you want to, you can custom build it.
